means: （以不同的方式或语言）复述，重述( retell的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: It is a tale which has often been retold within West Indian literature.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是西印度群岛文学中广为流传的故事。

sentence.Network_en: Robin's stories have been told and retold for over 600 years.
sentence.Network_cn: 罗宾的故事被人传诵和再传诵已有600多年.

sentence.Network_en: That fairy tale retold endlessly and in countless forms.
sentence.Network_cn: 那样的童话故事被反复不断地以无数种形式讲述着.

PerfectNetExp.abs: retiring 退休的retold 复述retool 重新整备
初中英语不规则动词表 ... told 告诉 retold 重讲，重复，复述 driven 驾驶.
自己总结不定词--过去式--过去分词 - 豆丁网 ... retell 复述；再讲；重述 retold 再讲 rewrite 改写；重写.
Robin ' s stories have been told and retold for over 600 years ., 罗宾的故事被人传诵和再传诵已有 600 多年.

list.abs: postmodernistic characteristic of old stories retold ., < 故事新编 > 的后现代主义特征.
and together you accomplished a feat that will be and retold down through the ages .你们一起成就了这个壮举，你们的事迹将被世代传诵。

entry.def: Retold is the past tense and past participle of retell.

auth_sentence.content: In China the story has been retold endlessly.
auth_sentence.res_content: In China the story has been retold endlessly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In China the story has been retold endlessly.

auth_sentence.content: He has retold the story countless times.
auth_sentence.res_content: He has retold the story countless times.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He has retold the story countless times.

auth_sentence.content: In such an instance, you have one myth that's retold, not two myths providing "corroboration".
